Play:
The Love Suicide at Amijima
(Ten no Amijima shigure no kotatsu / 天網島時雨炬燵)

First Staged: 1791

Reference: Kokuritsu Bunraku Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Bunraku Gekijō Chōsayōseika, vol. 8, April 1985; Bunraku April 1985, January 1994 Performance Programs

– Click image to view.

Performances:

February 1980: The Love Suicide at Amijima

April 1985: The Love Suicide at Amijima

February 1989: The Love Suicide at Amijima

January 1994: The Love Suicide at Amijima

Characters:

Jihei (Kamiya Jihei / 紙屋治兵衛)

Magoemon (Koya Magoemon / 粉屋孫右衛門)

Koharu (Kinokuniya Koharu / 紀の国屋小春)

Kawasho proprietor (Kawashō teishu / 河庄亭主)

Tahei (Edoya Tahei / 江戸屋太兵衛)

Zenroku (Gokanya Zenroku / 五貫屋善六)

Osan (Nyōbō Osan / 女房おさん)

Sangoro (Decchi Sangorō / 丁稚三五郎)

Gozaemon (Shūto Gozaemon / 舅五左衛門)

Kantaro (Segare Kantarō / 伜勘太郎)

Osue (Musume Osue / 娘お末)

Denkai (Denkaibō / 伝界坊)

Saibei (Kinokuniya Saibei / 紀の国屋才兵衛)

Osan's mother (Osan no haha / おさんの母)
